article_title: Republican Paul Wright, longtime judge, running for U.S. Senate
article_text:
NC Sen. Tarte at redistricting hearing at CPCC

Resident airs concerns at redistricting hearing at CPCC

Congressional redistricting is focus of hearing at CPCC

01:26

article_metadata.news-keywords: Paul Wright, U.S. Sen. Richard Burr, Republican primary for Senate, North Carolina, Tim Funk
article_metadata.description: Republican attorney Paul Wright of Mount Olive served 22 years as a judge – first in the District Court, then in the Superior Court.
